column4: can someone pls help me fix video problem in skype... please! :(
i can see my webcam properly on XawTV and Cheese Webcam Booth software etc... but i cant view it on skype. it just freezes for a while... when i try test.
hmm not sure.. what version of skype are you using?
not sure if it works in other apps then it must be a skype problem
is there any ubuntu version of skype i can use?
have you seen this? Maybe it is of some help https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SkypeWebCams
i've seen it... my webcam is not listed there... its so weird that this webcam works fine for everything but skype... and i have to login to windows to do skype... :(
Well thats the problem with proprietary software who's main target isn't linux
yeah but its too popular to even avoid... :S and that is miserable...  :S
have a look at this too: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Webcam
there's a section there that seems your case (you see 'something' but then it doesn't work)
thanks... i'll try following that webcam guide and pray that it works.
